nodes.text: A dealer droid served aboard the luxury train Exas Jewell during its maiden voyage on the planet Tyegin. The droid dealt cards during a game of Sabacc between D'Lina, Baj, Rakan and Lando Calrissian. As with other passengers, the dealer droid survived the ensuing pirate attack and dangerous acceleration of the train.
The croupier droid greatly resembles the GE3-series protocol droid seen in the Legends video game Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic.
